title: Gemcraft 2 Chasing Shadows v1.0.15 Cracked
description:
Gemcraft: Chapter 2: Chasing Shadows, version 1.0.15


This cracked version differs from the official version in the following ways:

- Can play it locally from your hard-drive..
- Premium mode is enabled, so you have access to all skills, and also endurance mode..
- The flash version check has been disabled..
- Has an optional cheat added that gives you more shadow-cores..

Starting with version 1.0.13 the flash version requirements went from 11.7 to 11.2 so that it can be played on linux, however, just in case, in this cracked version the check for flash version has been disabled, meaning you can use any flash version, even pre-11.2..

The shadow-core cheat works as follows:
On the map, you will now see a button that says "Get more shadow cores".. Every time that you click on that you will instantly gain 128 shadow-cores.. You can click it as much as you desire.. The only problem is that the shadow-core display doesn't update instantly, so you have to go to other screens/places to see the updated amount.. But each time you click the button, it really is adding shadow-cores every time you hear that clicking sound..
If you don't want to cheat, then don't click that button..


The official change-log from version 1.0.15 is as follows:

> 'Calling waves early' tutorial text made more clear
> 'Sigil' achievement made easier
> Journey notes screen: pages can be turned by clicking on them
> Gems in towers shouldn't fire at dying spires anymore + spire selection highlight is dropped when the spire starts to collapse
> The info panel doesn't cover the mana bar (min y set to 58 instead of 10 when in battle)
> Fixed: selecting a building made all gems outside range trying to attack buildings, same with creatures
> Fixed again: Gem enchantment shrines accept dragged bombs only
> Some typos fixed


Any way, have fun with this cracked gemcraft.. It will be years before the next gemcraft is released..
